unnormalised: ## Flash Sales: Blink and You'll Miss It! (And How to Snag the Best Deals!)
normalised: ## Flash Sales: Blink and You'll Miss It! (And How to Snag the Best Deals!)

unnormalised: Hey guys, ever felt that FOMO when you missed a crazy good deal? Chances are, it was a flash sale! These aren’t your regular Durga Puja discounts. We're talking super short, super sweet sales that can save you serious Rs. on everything from that new kurta you've been eyeing to kitchen appliances.
normalised: Hey guys, ever felt that F O M O when you missed a crazy good deal? Chances are, it was a flash sale! These aren't your regular Durga Puja discounts. We're talking super short, super sweet sales that can save you serious rupees on everything from that new kurta you've been eyeing to kitchen appliances.

unnormalised: So, what exactly *is* a flash sale? Think of it like this: it's a lightning strike of savings. A retailer, maybe Myntra or even your local saree shop, drops prices drastically for a limited time – often just a few hours or even minutes! The catch? You gotta be quick. Products vanish faster than jalebis at a Diwali party.

unnormalised: Why do companies like Reliance Trends do this? Well, it's a great way to clear out old inventory (gotta make room for the new collection!), attract new customers (who doesn't love a bargain?), and create a buzz around their brand. It's a win-win, assuming you're prepared!

unnormalised: Here's how to navigate the flash sale frenzy like a pro:

unnormalised: *   **Sign Up for Emails:** Seriously. This is your lifeline. Retailers usually announce upcoming sales via email newsletters.

unnormalised: *   **Follow Them on Social Media:** Get real-time updates and sneaky previews.

unnormalised: *   **Create an Account (Now!):** Don't waste precious seconds filling out forms when the sale starts.

unnormalised: *   **Know What You Want:** Browse beforehand and make a wishlist. No time for window shopping during the flash!
